ygData.subject: Re: Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: It means exactly what it says  +1 mana, no extra regeneration Nevyn Drunken Wizard of Mith Marr
ygData.messageBody:
It means exactly what it says +1 mana, no extra regeneration

Nevyn Drunken Wizard of Mith Marr
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gregory Egan [mailto:gemd@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 2:52 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Robe
>
>
> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
> Just bought the "senior apprentice" robe, with +1 mana. Does anyone know
> what this does? I mean does it give you more mana, or do you regenerate it
> faster? Thanks for any info.
>
> Greg (Kronan)
